name: TREE-raforming
description:
Collect, combine and shoot seeds to reforest the universe.
Seeds have two effects, one when hitting and enemy and another when hitting the environment. You can combine up to 5 seeds to bring chaos to the battlefield.

This is a sci-fi twin-stick shooter that emphatizes creativity and reflexes.

Controls:

WASD: movement
Mouse look to aim
LMB: Shoot
RMB: Cancel combo
1 to 6: Add a seed type to the combo.

You'll find two bosses and 7 enemies with lots of different attacks.

Made by:
Iván Piccione: Lead Game Design, Programming, Music.
Abigail Zubelzú: Level Design, UI/UX Design.
D. Leo Vasquez Trimboli: Game Design, Programming.

Made for the #BrackeysJam2021
Listen to the OST on SoundCloud!
https://soundcloud.com/bazztoner/sets/treeraforming-ost
